page.name: Chaosweaver Upgrades
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Weaver's Facade X
page.description: A relic of the early days of Soulweaving. Now that it's in your possession, what wonders will you weave? Can be upgraded at Secundus.

properties.name: Weaver's Facade X
properties.description: A relic of the early days of Soulweaving. Now that it's in your possession, what wonders will you weave? Can be upgraded at Secundus.

page.name: The Puppetmaster X
page.description: I will accompany you as you perform many deeds, great and small. Whatever you decide, your choices will be mine as well. Can be upgraded at Secundus.

properties.name: The Puppetmaster X
properties.description: I will accompany you as you perform many deeds, great and small. Whatever you decide, your choices will be mine as well. Can be upgraded at Secundus.

page.name: The Threadcutter IX
page.description: Secundus says this weapon is for your hands alone. Use it to carve out your place in Lore's history. This weapon has color custom features. Can be upgraded at Secundus.
